content:
I received my Ph.D. in cryptographic engineering from Nanjing University of Aeronautics and Astronautics (NUAA), supervised by Prof. Çetin Kaya Koç. My dissertation, titled “Research on Optimized Implementation of Public-key Cryptography Algorithms”, is available at thesis.
My research interests mainly involve post-quantum cryptography, elliptic curve cryptography and TLS protocol.
Email: jp-zhang@outlook.com
 Download my resumé. --

title: Jipeng Zhang
